Author: haydenadams#3292
Content:
Hi everyone, we would love user feedback on our updated (and in progress) Uniswap V2 interface! If you're interested, please visit https://v2.uniswap.exchange/ and connect your wallet to the Rinkeby testnet. It will also work with all other testnets, but they do not all have pools with liquidity in the default list ğŸ™‚ 

The site includes a link to a feedback form or just put your thoughts in #ğŸ“feedback ğŸ™‚

https://uniswap.org/blog/uniswap-v2/

Author: Noah Zinsmeister#4144
Content:
fee-on-transfer tokens should now be supported in the UI!

note that when swapping FoT tokens, it's required that you specify only an exact _input_, not _output_. additionally, please ensure that you set a slippage tolerance high enough to compensate for whatever fee the token extracts. for example, if a token takes a 1% fee on transfer, ensure your slippage is ~1.5% or so.

Author: callil#5116
Content:
Weâ€™ve slightly adjusted how settings work on the web app. Youâ€™ll now notice a gear for the settings in the top nav. Clicking this will open the new settings pane. Weâ€™ve moved the slippage, deadline and a few other things here to declutter the main UI. 

Youâ€™ll also find an expert mode for people who want the classic v1 swap behavior without a confirm screen. Please use with caution.

Let us know in #ğŸ“feedback what you think and feel free to request features for future versions!

-c

Author: haydenadams#3292
Content:
We've been receiving reports of scammers impersonating team members and opening up DMs with people in our discord. 

No one from our team will ever open up a new dm with you to answer a support question

Author: callil#5116
Content:
Reminder always Be Careful:

âš ï¸ Be suspicious of anyone who reaches out to you in private
âš ï¸ Never share your private keys or passwords with ANYONE (even if they claim to be from the Uniswap Team)
âš ï¸ Do not click on any links or download any files sent to you in a private message
âš ï¸ Never send funds to anyone you don't know

**Uniswap members will NEVER DM you first and NEVER ask for your information or send you links to "fix" your account.**

Content: Pinned a message.

Author: moody ğŸ¦„#6640
moody ğŸ¦„#6640
Content:
Reporting a fake Uniswap Google Ad:
Click "Why this ad?"
Click "Report this ad"
Select "An ad violates other Google Ads policies"
Select "Search Ad"
Select "Cyber Frauds"
Select "Phishing"
Under additional details, enter "Fake Uniswap Interface"
Hit Submit

Reporting a fake Uniswap site to Google:
Go to https://safebrowsing.google.com/safebrowsing/report_phish/
Enter the URL here
Enter "This site is imitating app.uniswap.org to steal user funds" in the additional details
Hit Submit Report

Author: callil#5116
Content:
We are excited to announce Token Lists, a new standard for creating lists of ERC20 tokens. This is a community initiative to improve discoverability and trust in ERC20 token lists in a manner that is inclusive, transparent, and decentralized.

Read more at the blog post: https://uniswap.org/blog/token-lists/
Or browse lists at https://tokenlists.org

Content:
Hi everyone - you may have seen by now but we just launched UNI! 
https://uniswap.org/blog/uni

Author: callil#5116
Content: I made a fun token logo for the launch and the main site https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap should be updated very very soon and you'll be able to CLAIM UNI!

Author: callil#5116
Content:
Some info and a special note for this community:

**Uniswap owes its success to the thousands of community members that have joined its journey over the past two years. These early community members will naturally serve as responsible stewards of Uniswap.

15% of UNI [150,000,000 UNI] can immediately be claimed by historical liquidity providers, users, and SOCKS redeemers/holders based on a snapshot endingSeptember 1, 2020, at 12:00 am UTC.
**

Author: callil#5116
Content:
Hello friends, a reminder that the community run **Uniswap Grants Program** is now live! It was voted into effect at the end of last year and the applications are now OPEN! Deadlines are February 28th (Wave 1) and May 31st (Wave 2). There is a lot to read and understand but this is the high level overview...

If you've EVER built something around the Uniswap ecosystem and would like to continue this work check out this program.

```Our mission is to continue cultivating this enthusiasm and talent, so to start, UGP seeks to support focused areas accomplishing the following:

- **Usability** - improving the user experience
- **Community** - growing the ecosystem
- **Tooling** - improving the developer experience

Support is available for both individuals and teams attempting to provide innovative solutions, tackling problems, or contributing to existing tools for the three focused areas above.```

https://pbs.twimg.com/card_img/1350235114731659264/kViTtD0c?format=jpg&name=medium

Initial forum discussion: https://gov.uniswap.org/t/rfc-uniswap-grants-program-v0-1/9081/32
Application form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd6TdE0mPtLjTU3KRkFqUPM1o--yaT8tpozxk-_jnVL6sPdGA/viewform
Info site: https://www.notion.so/Welcome-to-UNI-Grants-6e3e84967a984a5fb127ae749649ddc9

Author: callil#5116
Content:
The first round of UNI grants was just announced!

```Without further ado, we are extremely pleased to announce that the UNI Grants Program will be awarding the full budget of $750,000 in grants to 23 teams across the UNI community! These grantees represent various parts of the protocol from support team within the UNI Discord sever to a ragequit mechanism for governance-funded multisigs.```

Blog Post: https://www.notion.so/UGP-Q1-Updates-a24ad2d072184120a06ce3ad330385eb
Twitter Thread: https://twitter.com/uniswapgrants/status/1371893183454580738

Author: jab#9351
Content: There's been several reports of a scam email going out, this is not from uniswap, please do not click links in the email (or any other email that looks suspicious). There's nothing the uniswap team can do about this scam, so feel free to delete the email. It's been reported that they got your email as a result of Ledger's commerce and marketing database breach. You can read more about the breach here: https://www.ledger.com/addressing-the-july-2020-e-commerce-and-marketing-data-breach

Author: BOR4#8524
Content:
Hi all! Flipside Cryptoâ€™s Uniswap proposal to leverage a $25 million grant to generate 30% yield and fund Uniswap Community-Enabled Analytics is now live!

The most important things to know about the proposal are:

    .    It will be guided first and foremost by a â€œNo Negative Net UNIâ€ ethos, whereby the full initial grant amount is maintained
    .    The generated yield will be transformed into bounties directing analysts to produce insights and interactive solutions for the Uniswap community. That includes offerings like the Uniswap V3 Fee Calculator, a result of  initial UGP pilot - uniswapv3.flipsidecrypto.com
    .    The grant structure includes both Allocation and Oversight Committees to provide checks and balances throughout this process. Oversight Committee members are Nic Carter, Dave Balter and Boris Stanic. There will also be an Allocation Committee, which includes Will Price and Nathan Howard, as well as two members from University Blockchain Groups [announced after the vote to not steer outcomes!]

You can find more info and vote below. You can discuss the proposal in the #âŒup6-community-enabled-analytics . Make sure you cast your vote to make sure your voice is heard and help Flipside Crypto assist Uniswap governance at this major moment!

https://app.uniswap.org/#/vote/1/2

Content:
â˜• Uniswap Labs Developer Office Hours #1  â˜• 
Friday (September 3rd) at 13:00 EST
agenda:
----------------------------------------------------
Open question format!

This is an open office hours where developers in the community can ask any technical questions on their mind, and developers at Uniswap labs will be available to answer live. 

The forum will be in a live chat in the #uniswap-developers channel group.
 
Come hang out on Friday! anyone is welcome to listen, learn, and ask questions. No requirements to participate, all we ask is that all those attending be respectful of everyones time - so that all questions can be answered.
----------------------------------------------------

Author: BOR4#8524
Content:
